Hang it all! (WHISPERING WITH DEE?

DRAPER
You were telling me to speak low!
Woman! You’re shrieking!
GUILLE
(IN A WHISPER) It’s you who are making
all the noise!
DRAPER
Look here! I must be off. Hand over—

SHHhhl Speak low, will you!

(MEEKLY) I ask payment for six yards
